content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Decompression Rules Files contained in compressed files can be scanned for digital assets. To determine the files to scan, Data Loss Prevention subjects a compressed file to the following rules: Size of a decompressed file exceeds: __ MB (1-10240 MB) Compression layers exceed: __ (1-20) Number of files to scan exceeds: __ (1-2000) Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
